entry.title: Current Conditions: -0.7Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Terra Nova National Park 11:30 PM NDT Saturday 1 April 2023
Temperature: -0.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.6 kPa falling
Humidity: 74 %
Wind Chill: -4
Dewpoint: -4.8°C
Wind: S 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: n/a

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow or ice pellets. Low minus 2 with temperature rising to zero by morning.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow beginning near midnight then changing to ice pellets before morning. Risk of freezing rain before morning. Blowing snow over exposed areas overnight. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southeast 30 gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 along parts of the coast overnight. Low minus 2 with temperature rising to zero by morning. Wind chill minus 9 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of rain or drizzle. High 8.
entry.summary: Ice pellets or freezing rain changing to periods of rain or drizzle in the morning. Rainfall amount 2 mm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 along parts of the coast early in the morning. Wind becoming light in the morning then becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High 8. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Rain mixed with snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Rain ending near midnight then partly cloudy. Rain mixed with snow late in the evening. Rainfall amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Saturday 1 April 2023
